subs.text: Looks good with the Dems assuming power in the House, but I can't help wondering if the Repubs have figured out how to screw it up.
Kevin Tofel reports a problem using "Likes" on a Chromebook. I'm guessing it has something to do with localStorage.

I had dinner last night at Han Dynasty on the Upper West Side. It was delicious. The place is huge, you could throw a big party there. I told my young companion that I want my funeral to be held there. The service was great. And every dish was wonderful. So tasty.
